Class PowerupFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.powerup.PowerupFactory

extends java.lang.Object

      • manageDamageToken

        private static void manageDamageToken​(Player target,
                                      DamageToken token,
                                      boolean isMark)
        Manages effects which give a mark or a damage token to a target
        Parameters:
        target - the target of this effect
        token - the damage token to give to the target
        isMark - whether or not the damage token should be added as a mark or a damage

        private static void manageMoveInDirection​(Player owner,
                                          Player target,
                                          Interviewer interviewer,
                                          Range range)
        Manages effects which moves the target in a fixed direction
        Parameters:
        owner - the owner of the powerup
        target - the target of this effect
        interviewer - the communication proxy
        range - the range of blocks available for the moves
